title: Outhue
author: Outhue
content: Imagine your jasminer dying on you, now of all time that Ethereum mining is going away, hobbyist miner now has a jasminer that's broken, I almost I mean so close to buying this miner until some posts on here said its a bad idea.https://youtu.be/TQr-KCfmZKs

comments.author: P00P135
comments.body: Quote from: Outhue on August 19, 2022, 05:40:31 PMImagine your jasminer dying on you, now of all time that Ethereum mining is going away, hobbyist miner now has a jasminer that's broken, I almost I mean so close to buying this miner until some posts on here said its a bad idea.https://youtu.be/TQr-KCfmZKshe was able to get it working if you bothered to even watch the video.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: and i was checking these on jasminer website they are costly gear.

comments.author: Outhue
comments.body: Quote from: P00P135 on August 19, 2022, 06:42:24 PMQuote from: Outhue on August 19, 2022, 05:40:31 PMImagine your jasminer dying on you, now of all time that Ethereum mining is going away, hobbyist miner now has a jasminer that's broken, I almost I mean so close to buying this miner until some posts on here said its a bad idea.https://youtu.be/TQr-KCfmZKshe was able to get it working if you bothered to even watch the video.You are not looking at the big picture, you will have to swap the board once the ports go bad, yea he was able to fix but compare this miner to others, if that thing gets fault that's not cable refixing its a big trouble.

comments.author: deedeeranged
comments.body: Quote from: Outhue on August 21, 2022, 08:53:21 AMQuote from: P00P135 on August 19, 2022, 06:42:24 PMQuote from: Outhue on August 19, 2022, 05:40:31 PMImagine your jasminer dying on you, now of all time that Ethereum mining is going away, hobbyist miner now has a jasminer that's broken, I almost I mean so close to buying this miner until some posts on here said its a bad idea.https://youtu.be/TQr-KCfmZKshe was able to get it working if you bothered to even watch the video.You are not looking at the big picture, you will have to swap the board once the ports go bad, yea he was able to fix but compare this miner to others, if that thing gets fault that's not cable refixing its a big trouble.The OP hasn't said which Jasminer we have to imagine if he means a 5GB Jasminer or the 6GB and more.Does he mean it is broken or just it cannot mine anymore ETH?

comments.author: DevFile90
comments.body: Jasminer is not bad like OP is making the whole thing look but I hate the machine because its too costly for the hashrate, we are in a bear market and this bad boy value don't decrease, hell no! I'd rather buy some 3060 and fire ðŸ”¥ on.
